name: 999 Design
tagline: Glasgow Branding, Design and Digital Agency
description:
999 was established in 1982. We're an award winning, full service communications agency working across online and offline disciplines. 
With offices in London and Glasgow we remain independent and more passionate than ever about the impact design can make. We are absolutely committed to helping our clients develop. Two offices. One aim: to create effective, inspirational design and communications. 
We prize creative talent and innovation. We value intelligence and humour.
